item.title: Macbook users must swap Caps Lock and Ctrl Keys. Seriously!
item.description: I tell this to everyone I meet who uses a MacBook. I mean, come on. People who are used to using a Windows keyboard put their pinky on the bottom left key of the keyboard to reach for the control key, and it’s easy to reach too since the Ctrl key is pretty wide.
